attributes.action: Reduce the number of patients in dental clinics during Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: To stop corona virus spreading and protect both employees and patients alike. Dental surgeries are one of the highest risk professions, we have dental professionals, assistants, patient and patients relatives in surgeries, sometimes up to 5-6 people at a time who are coming just for a routine check up. Limit these to necessary and urgent appointments only.
attributes.background: Reduce the number of patients in dental clinics or orthodontics just for emergencies. During corona virus. As waiting  rooms usually gets full of patients especially in orthodontic clinics.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government has said non-urgent dental work should be suspended.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
